content: Stream created by Morgan Rogers.

Born from a discussion on writing about mathematics, the aim of this stream is to host discussions about how we communicate our findings, to each other and to the public. General discussion about academic life and institutions are also acceptable if pursued respectfully.

For people who might not be aware of this little hack, if you e.g. want to show and live-edit LaTeX formulas during a video chat with screen recording, here's how
https://youtu.be/bk0J7WGwk90
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

A stream for discussing discussion

  • New description:

A stream for discussing outreach, teaching and exposition.
